effects:
Gain access to following skills for one turn:
	Belly to Back (504560)
Increase ATK by 110% for 2 turns to caster
name: Transformation

desc_short.0: Add chance of boosting ATK when receiving a physical or magic attack and enable belly to back for 2 turns
desc_short.5: Puede aumentar el ATQ al recibir un ataque físico o mágico, aprende Barrispalda durante 2 turnos
